alert.note: Alert for Sheridan Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 13 at 2:39AM MST until February 14 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Montana, Southern Big Horn and Southern Rosebud. In Wyoming, Sheridan Foothills. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
